entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
